::: resumen
This website showcases data visualizations on snails, water bodies, Fasciola hepatica cases,
environmental indices,temperature, and other data collected in the TMRC project.
The warning objective is to characterize the microenvironment of communities
in Cusco using high-resolution images, including processed images from multispectral
and thermal drones.These tools enable us to identify potential areas for water body
formation and snail proliferation, there by contributing to the understanding
and management of these phenomena in the local environment.
:::
